basics.name: Seth NeJame
basics.label: Junior Software Developer
basics.summary: Currently enrolled as a Junior Software Developer in a 16-week full-stack development bootcamp at CraftAcademy in Stockholm, Sweden.

work.summary:
16 week software development bootcamp featuring a full stack curriculum including HTML/CSS,
        JavaScript, React, Ruby, Rails and more. Focused on teaching devs to utilize a test-driven approach to 
        development, using tools such as RSpec, Node, Cucumber and Cypress. 

        Heavy focus on collaboration and pair-programming - each week features a new project/problem set to 
        complete with 60+hour workload full of live demos, coding sessions and real-world client/app interaction.

skills.name: Full Stack Development
keywords: TDD Development w/ RSpec, NPM/E2E, Cucumber
